articles.content:

articles.author: Tom Wilson
articles.title: HSBC settles forex deals worth $250 billion on blockchain in last year
articles.description: HSBC has settled $250 billion worth of forex trades using blockchain in the last year, it said on Monday, suggesting the heavily hyped technology is gaining traction in a sector until now hesitant to embrace it.
articles.content:
LONDON (Reuters) - HSBC (HSBA.L) has settled $250 billion worth of forex trades using blockchain in the last year, it said on Monday, suggesting the heavily hyped technology is gaining traction in a sector until now hesitant to embrace it.
